title: Talking Targon with the Foundations team

replies.body:
Just an idea, World of Warcraft have a few books about their "heroes"
Could we have a few books full of stories on our champs, like hard cover ones from the merch store that would be pretty cool.

The problem here is that the difference between Blizzard and Riot lore; one actually has a minimum standard.

(Admit it, League lore sucks unless you're at a grade 5 reading level)

Grade 5? 
I know Grade 5 swimming (level 5)
Grade 5 music (AMEB grade 5)
but no "reading grade 5?!?!??!"

Fine; year 5 reading level. As in the level of school you're in when you're 10 or 11 years old.

And admittedly, League lore is getting better, but it's still got a long way to go before there's enough quality to make even a short novel out of.

oh, makes sense, but what year are u in?
5?
I'm well out of school, mate.
i completely agree
Fantastic concept. If you expand the lore of the characters in LoL, and intertwine them, you create a more cohesive whole. Each game then becomes a fantasy aspect of that whole.
beautifully put
yes very true, i will love league a lot more if this happens

Riot I have a question. Are we going to get the hextech system or are you going to cop out like you did with the dominion game mode??? It is annoying to feel as if im not really playing the real lol due to being in oce only... Dominion was never a thing and 3v3 is only online for the briefest moments... I would love to be answered and some form conformation that the extra content is coming to oce rather than you short handing us again ty.....
When is the new Runeterra map being created?
Why do they need to make a new one?
Because, the old one is out dated.

What if, one day, international disputes that can't be settled diplomatically, are settled in the Fields of Justice? HOW COOL WOULD THAT BE? INSTEAD OF EVERYONE NUKING EVERYONE LET'S JUST PLAY LEAGUE!!!
Korea has bigger/better/more nukes and bigger/better/more pro League of Legends players though .-.
So? Maybe it's time for America to drop off the top of the economy chain. Besides, it would be an opportunity for League to become an even bigger community!
Did you see last year's worlds?
I agree with Ezeblood {{summoner:30}}
So... Diana skin finally?

pls, u forgot URF the manatee
Can you rework {{champion:19}}, because he looks like a downsydromed weasel... XD
so are riot gonna redo shacos lore, it tells you close to nothing about him just speculation and it refers to the institute of war and summoners, which im pretty sure aren't canon anymore

How about doing something on {{champion:44}} for once? A character bio about him, maybe something about skarner mixed in his lore or something? Even better, could you rework him in some way? I mean, you reworked {{champion:98}} for having a basic kit then theres {{champion:44}} who has a point and click stun & heal… It seems like {{champion:44}} is being left behind :(

hey guys, do we realize that the aurelien sol trailer relates to this?
AU SOL = STAR
DIANA = MOON
LEONA = SUN
PANTHEON = Hero on top of dat mountain in trailer
cool story bro
